black.content: The prophet Brutha was heavily opposed to _.
The great god Om forbids the use of _.
Is there anything an Omnian loves more than _?
The prophet Brutha preached at length on the benefits of _.
What does Constable Visit masturbate to? _.
The prophet Brutha seemed to think about _ quite a lot.
Omnian teaching preaches in favour of _.

white: Torturing and executing your own citizens to keep them on their toes.
Trying to get people to see the light.
Memorising all the books in the Library of Ephebe.
Abandoning your life in favour of improving the lives of the suffering.
Purifying the ungodly and expurgating sin.
Bursting into tears when someone actually wants to read one of your pamphlets.
Knocking on door after door, even though no one ever answers.
The Church of the Latter-Day Omnians.

pack.name: Life On The Disc: Omnian Edition
